visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a column chart with the following specifications: Chart type: column, Chart title: 'Product Performance', Axes and labels styling: X-axis labels should be red and auto-rotation set to 0, Data series: One series with data [-29.9, -71.5, -106.4, -129.2, -144.0, -176.0], Custom colors: Not specified, Additional configurations: Set the chart background to light gray and include a legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object is configured to render a column chart with a title 'Product Performance'. The X-axis labels are styled to be red and are not auto-rotated. The chart displays one data series with the specified values. The chart background is set to light gray, and a legend is included to enhance readability. This configuration is suitable for visualizing product performance metrics in a clear and concise manner.
